Text:
thanks for uploading
i believe the reason so few ppl leave a comment is that you have to sign in to the site to do this
I've been downloading so far without doing that and this is the first time I've commented 
I've wanted to comment but never registered before now.. 

Is there some way the site could allow ppl to leave a note of thanks without going to the trouble of registering?

I feel for you man and I agree. No comments sucks.
Anyway thanks for this upload and your efforts.
